attributes.action: Completely rule out mandatory Covid 19 vaccination passports for social events
attributes.background: We want the government to stop discriminating against unvaccinated citizens by restricting their human rights and freedom of movement by introducing Covid 19 vaccination passports for social and other events.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
